Package com.redis.foundation.io

Class DataDocJSON

java.lang.Object
com.redis.foundation.io.DataDocJSON
public class DataDocJSON extends Object
This I/O utility class provides methods to save/load data document instances as JSON documents. This JSON encoding is handled by Google's GSON package.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:
  • Gson User Guide

      IOException - I/O exception

    • loadList

      public List<DataDoc> loadList(String aPathFileName) throws IOException
      Loads an array of JSON objects from the path/file name into a list of data document instances. The logic is smart enough to determine if the JSON file consists of an array of objects or a simple one and parse it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Path file name
      Returns:
      List of data documents
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O exception

    • loadFromString

      public Optional<DataDoc> loadFromString(String aJSONString)
      Parses JSON string into an optional data document instance.
      Parameters:
      aJSONString - A JSON formatted object string
      Returns:
      Optional data document instance
